attributes.action: Stop charging students for University during Covid-19!
attributes.additional_details: Because we are wasting money as we’re not using university resources as much and I don’t think it’s FAIR
attributes.background: Stop charging University students for their academic year as we are rarely in the University! It’s mostly online therefore we are paying for something we’re not even receiving properly

rejection.details:
We understand you don't want students to be charged tuition fees, however given it is individual universities as autonomous institutions which charge fees, not the Government, it's not clear what specific action you would like the Government to take.

It is also not clear precisely what proportion of fees you want students to not be charged.

You may wish to sign these petitions which call for related actions:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555583
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324762
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552911
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552814

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

The Government has also created an online service to help you find out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips

You can read impartial analysis of the Government response to coronavirus and policy developments here: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/coronavirus/

You may also be interested to know that because of the large number of petitions that have been started in relation to coronavirus, the Petitions Committee has been questioning the Government about its response to the coronavirus outbreak.

Find out more: https://committees.parliament.uk/work/192/the-governments-response-to-coronavirus/
